name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-pnp-controls-list-view-fields
title: PnP ListView with PnP Field Controls Web Part
shortDescription: Sample web part to display PnP ListView control with column rendering using PnP Field Controls.
longDescription: Sample web part to display PnP ListView control with column rendering using PnP Field Controls.

thumbnails.alt: PnP ListView with PnP Field Controls Web Part
PnP ListView with PnP Field Controls Web Part

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
